snippet: The peer-to-peer service, now in a test phase, emphasizes the security measures taken before an owner can list, or a renter can borrow, a car, recreational vehicle, all terrain vehicle, boat or motorcycle.
abstract: The peer-to-peer service, now in a test phase, emphasizes the security measures taken before an owner can list, or a renter can borrow, a car, recreational vehicle, all terrain vehicle, boat or motorcycle.
lead_paragraph: Peer-to-peer car-sharing services, which allow owners to rent their vehicles directly to other drivers, scored some notable successes in 2011, as well as some embarrassing failures. A new service is counting on a robust security apparatus and the variety of vehicles, not just cars, that it offers to distinguish it in this crowded start-up segment.

headline.main: JustShareIt Enters Suddenly Crowded, and Wary, Car-Sharing Market
